title: Bets as NFTs.
description: Transparency in betting games should be improved. Also there is no possibility to trade / move ongoing betting positions and no souvenir.
solution: Printing bets (e.g. the score of a sports game) into NFTs will add transparency and a secondary market for ongoing bets in betting games.
experience: We are a Plutus Pioneer Cohort 2 participant and website dev and a business dude. We successfully launched an NFT project in April.
